name: eslint-config-lob
description: Shareable ESLint config for Lob repositories

scripts.patch-release: node scripts/changelog.js && git commit -am 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.minor-release: node scripts/changelog.js --minor && git commit -am 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
